name: WY-CR-Y0V
description:
As the automated research station WY-CR's central network is compromised, a failsafe is activated. One drone, identifier Y0V, separate from the main network, is still functioning, and is now responsible for reaching the main computer and restoring control.

Game will autosave on entering a healing zone (specifically, when touching the particle effect that heals you).

Controls (some actions may require corresponding powerup):

  • Xbox A / QWERTY Z: Jump/Double Jump/Wall Jump
  • Xbox X / QWERTY X: Sword
  • Xbox RB/RT / QWERTY Shift: Dash
  • Xbox LB/LT / QWERTY Tab: View Map
  • Xbox B / QWERTY M: Toggle Music
